english.segment1: I tried to run. I tried to fight You. But I'm done. I'm giving up. I've learned to trust You, Your love
english.segment3: Can You take over?. Take over. Can You take over me?. I've been here over and over again. Here on my knees. I'm only closer and closer. To where I wanna be. When You take over, take over. Can You take over me?
english.segment4: I tried before. To let go. And I just hold on more. Amazing Lord. I need the strength to let go. And be Yours
english.segment6: Can You take over?. Take over. Can You take over me?. I've been here over and over again. Here on my knees. I'm only closer and closer. To where I wanna be. When You take over, take over. Can You take over me?
english.segment7: I surrender all I have. And I surrender all I am. As I remember what You've done to set me free
english.segment9: Can You take over?. Take over. Can You take over me?. I've been here over and over again. Here on my knees. I'm only closer and closer. To where I wanna be. When You take over, take over. Can You take over me?
english.segment10: Can You take over?. Take over. Can You take over me?. I've been here over and over again. Here on my knees. I'm only closer and closer. To where I wanna be. When You take over, take over. Can You take over me?
english.segment11: Take over me. Take over me
